trends: There have been 126 other sightings in Indianapolis
There were no other sightings in Indianapolis on or around November 30th 1981
divs: sighting detailsi was driving down east washington street in marion county, indiana in about 1982\1983. my son was looking out the car window and he said "look there's a flying saucer. i looked up, and saw it. i hurried to the first street and pulled into a parking lot. we sat there watching the disc, for about 5 minutes. it was just above the tree level. there was no noise. it had lights underneath it, that flashed on and off. other cars were driving down the street and did not see the disc. one other car parked by me and watched it to. the lights were red white and blue, or red white and green. it has been so long now, that i can't quite remember the exact colors. it seemed like it was there for water or the electrical lines. it finally just disappeared. i can't really remember the year also, i did call 911, and asked if anyone else had seen the ufo. he acted, as if, i was crazy. a few days later, there were a lot of people near muncie, indiana that seen exactly what i had saw. janine
